name: Orange Thief
description:
Try to collect all 30 oranges within 60 seconds without getting caught!

Controls:

A and D to move

W or Space to jump

Left click on an enemy to pause them

Right click anywhere to unpause the currently paused enemy

Press 'R' at any time to restart the game

Tips:
  • Paused enemies can be used as platforms to reach hard-to-access areas.
  • When paused, an enemy is unaffected by gravity and cannot catch you.
  • Only one enemy can be paused at a time.
  • Your click doens't need to be pixel-perfect; the glow effect will show you which enemy will be paused when you click.

This was originally meant for the Mini Jam 60 (https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-60) but things came up and I couldn't complete this on time, so I fleshed it out more.

Enjoy!
